sights for the M60A1. There are bigger one and normal one. It will probably work with RISE and M60.

#m60 #m60a1 #m60a1_aos

Прицел для T-72M2 Moderna с разметкой для 30-мм пушки 2A42.


Разметка полезна для облегчения стрельбы с автопушки на близкой дистанции, в городе и на небольшие дистанции. Вести огонь дальше не позволяет уже разброс самой пушки.

Хоть мой прицел 2A42 и имеет небольшие погрешности, он всё равно позволяет стрелять точнее.

#t72m2 #moderna #t72m2moderna

Maus and T35 sights, mainly because of the very different projectale velocity in the guns.
notice: have just the essential projectile types to not crowd the sight

to install: don't follow what the zip says, instead open the zip and copypaste the folder into the wt main folder

#maus #t_35 #t35 #pzelia

A sight for the Strf90- tank series, based off one of the vehicle's sight in Steel Beasts.
Updated sight to have "detect Ally" ability in simulator battles.
Updated lighting color, outer scope ring, and added the sight to the Strf9040b.
An easy way to equip the sight is to:
1. Get into a test drive with any vehicle.
2. Press the escape button and navigate your way to "Options".
3. Click on "Default grid sight" in Common Battle Settings and then click "Add a grid sight". This will create the folder "all_tanks". You can delete the new grid sight (called "sight_1").
4. After all that, go i...

Две версии прицельных сеток от французских танков. Оба прицела универсальны. Ранее я уже выкладывал пост с один из них, а теперь добавился второй и оба были подвергнуты некоторым доработкам.

First sight I made, rn works only for type 10 but I'll probably make it for all tanks(I FIXED IT NOW IT WORKS FOR ALL TANK))))).. uhhh I ummm... you can edit and add other shit around the drawing #anime #gate #rory_mercury #sight #alltanks #rory

#brummbar
4000 metr Brummbar Sight

ОПИСАНИЕ
Три версии немецких прицелов, которые не имею никаких рисок. Пожалуй, это и будет являться особенностью данного пака, ибо Вас вообще ничего не будет отвлекать, да и баллистику снаряда Ваших танков выучите за одно, уж поверьте, это не сложно! Неплохо подойдёт для танков небольших рангов, где-то до Pz.IV F2, но и дальше их никто не запрещает использовать, ибо оба прицела - универсальны.


_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________...

ОПИСАНИЕ
Прицел был взят из фильма "28 панфиловцев" от пушки не знаю какого калибра. Является ли он историчным - не знаю. В заранее извиняюсь за качество первой фотографии, но тут ничего не поделать. Прицел является универсальным, неплохо подошёл бы для начальных самоходок, где нужна дистанция не более 500 метров.


_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

This sight is for #type10 #type_10 ,Japanese Version, Improved from @Nirrti and @Egoistic_Lily

#universal #sight #spaa #tank #tanks

Sights shown on M13MGMC (Universal_Simple_SPAA)
and also M5A1 Stuart (Universal_Simple_All)
Both sights are set up to be usable in any tank, spg, spaa, really any ground vehicle.
Tank sight has graduations from 400m to 2km, works very well for most situations when distance is set to 200m, as there's a small cross aligned with bore axis (0m distance), horizontal graduations are increments of 8, spaced apart for high visibility. Added also a small chevron from origin that extends 1 thou down and to either side, to aid in beyond-2km aim if your distance ...
This sight is for #type10 #type_10 ,Japanese Version, Improved from @BarteG98PL #m1abrams sight.

Updated for Version 2.23 "Apex Predators"!

WAO (Waffenoptik) for the PUMA IFV, based on a video posted by the Bundeswehr on YouTube. The sight is mostly the same, although I did add a black frame to help when minimum zoom. I opted to not include information like the tank's speed and gun inclination as this would be purely graphical and have no function in-game. Personally I dislike how small the sight is when at minimum zoom, in real life the FCS would keep the sight the same size no matter the zoom level but in War Thunder...

#fv438 #fv102 #uk_fv102_striker #uk_fv438_swingfire #swingfire #greatbritain #great_britain #uk #historical #semihistorical #sights #reticles

This is the GPS & GPSE sight of the Swingfire missile launchers.

it is designed to be close to the historical sight.

Both sights have been combat-tested, but if you want to engage in long-distance combat, i recommend the GPSE version.

Since it is missile-only, the range measurement feature has been removed.
Either way, neither FV has a laser rangefinder.

I wanted to make a close combat hitpoint, but I couldn't guarantee accuracy, ...

Schindibee's fictional "SCOLIA" Sight package for M-51 variants

#customsight #sight #fictional #scolia #m51 #m_51

This is a fully fictional sight package for the Israeli M-51 (regular tree and premium) including the following easy to use features:

- Simplified ranging scale for main ammo (105mm HEAT and HE), up to 3'200 meters
- Ranging funnels configured for tank lengths of 7m (full line) and width of 3.5m (dotted line)
- Deflection shooting aim crosses for targets traveling at 20 km/h (inner) and 40 km/h (outer)
- Additional Stadiametric Rangefinder (optional: choos...
